description:
Yamazaki Kenji is a trusted member of Tonegawa`s team.
He first caught Tonegawa`s attention when he suggested a game that would eventually become the game of Restricted Rock-Paper-Scissors, a proposal which impressed Tonegawa. Soon, Tonegawa began to trust Yamazaki more than most other team members, coming to discuss several issues with Yamazaki before bringing them to the team`s attention and allowing Yamazaki to cover for him whenever he is absent.
name: Yamazaki Kenji
